results.title: Product | Strategy | Verisk Marketing Solutions
results.content: PRODUCT & STRATEGY Superior Data to Power Innovative Products Build with confidence by tapping into deep identity, attribute, and behavioral data on 260 million U.S. consumers and 130 million households. Let's Talk The Right Data to Optimize Outcomes
results.raw_content:
ROUNDUP ON IDENTITY SOLUTIONS AND DATA
PRODUCT & STRATEGY
Superior Data to Power Innovative Products
Let’s Talk
The Right Data to Optimize Outcomes
As competition intensifies for consumer data-based innovations, you need the right data to enhance and build solutions that exceed your clients’ expectations.
Verisk Marketing Solutions rigorously maintains census-level data covering every consumer and household in the U.S. with nearly 100 million updates every day – enabling you to connect, update, complete, and enhance your own 1st party assets as well as those from any of your third-party providers.
Tap into a Single Source of Truth
Our proprietary Identity and Digital Device Graph brings together trusted data from digital and offline sources. The result? A single source of truth that enables best-in-class identity resolution and enrichment.
250+
MILLION
U.S. CONSUMERS
100+
MILLION
DAILY UPDATES
120+
MILLION
U.S. HOUSEHOLDS
30
YEARS
HISTORICAL VERIFIED
IDENTITY ASSETS
495+
MILLION
UNIQUE MAIDS
IP
ACTIVE ADDRESS
FOR EACH DEVICE
Create Granular Audiences for Greater Value
Give advertisers what they want: highly specific audiences that drill down to the zip-code level as well as added attributes such as pet ownership, vehicle affinities and so much more.
Work With and Beyond Walled Gardens
Verisk Marketing Solutions helps you create a data asset that rivals the biggest brands in the U.S. We also work with many large data warehouses such as AWS and Snowflake.
Improve Measurement
For panels of any size, accurately measure consumer engagement based on a footprint of the entire U.S. adult consumer population and their associated devices.
Expand Reach
Supply-side and demand-side platforms struggle to reach all consumers across all of their devices. We get platforms closer to 100% of coverage for every individual and device, including tablets, phones, gaming systems, and more.
Build with Better Data
Let us show you all the ways you can tap into the most complete view of U.S. consumers and their households.
Let’s Talk
Additional Resources to Guide You
Valuable consumer data was in short supply at the Big Ten Conference before Nate Schrader joined as Senior Vice President […]
Personalized marketing is here to stay. In a recent survey, 99% of marketers believe personalization will be important to improving […]
The near-constant evolution of adtech, media, consumer preferences, and data privacy regulations creates a cloudy picture for marketers today, but […]

results.title: CES 2024 | Verisk Marketing Solutions
results.content: Verisk Marketing Solutions merges the proprietary identity and behavioral data assets of Infutor and Jornaya—creating one-of-a-kind data solutions for consumer intelligence, lead intelligence, TCPA consent verification, and marketing personalization.
results.raw_content:
ROUNDUP ON IDENTITY SOLUTIONS AND DATA
Let’s Connect at CES 2024
Meet the Verisk Marketing Solutions team at CES 2024 to discover how we provide best-in-class consumer identity and behavioral data for many of today's leading advertising platforms and service providers. We will be conducting meetings to learn more in our very own Aria Sky Suite, high above the Las Vegas strip. Talk about a breathtaking view and photo op! Speaking of views: We’ll show you what you can achieve with access to the most current and complete view of 250 million U.S. consumers and 120 million U.S. households. Intrigued? Fill out the form to book some time with us on-site at CES 2024.
I'd Like to Meet at
CES 2024!
Why We Want to Meet You
We provide the future for consumer experience driven by insights available today.
We offer best-in-class identity data for over 250M consumers and 120M households in the U.S., alongside the earliest indicators of in-market shopping behavior. These consumer profiles power personalized interactions aimed at engaging the right person, with the right message, at the right time — all of which is compliant with state and federal rules for permissible collection and use of consumer data and right to opt-out.
Verisk | Marketing Solutions
Verisk Marketing Solutions merges the proprietary identity and behavioral data assets of Infutor and Jornaya—creating one-of-a-kind data solutions for consumer intelligence, lead intelligence, TCPA consent verification, and marketing personalization.
We’ve helped thousands of marketers and platform partners maintain a more complete picture of consumer profiles, households, and in-market behavior— providing real-time insights that help acquire, retain, and grow their ideal customers.
We are proud to call a wide variety of leading Insurance Carriers, Mortgage Lenders, Banks, Credit Unions, Higher Education Institutions, Platform Service Providers, and Lead Generation firms our customers and partners. Together, we are working to improve consumer experiences and profitability through data driven insights.
January 9 – 12
Let us help you remove the guesswork about consumer identity, which leads to buy, and how to confidently time and tailor outreach for better experiences that drive results.
Personalize right timed outreach based on earliest indicator of in-market shopping behavior
Verify consent in real-time and prove consent in the event of a complaint
Gain insights on leads before you buy, so you can buy better quality leads and improve ROI
Consumer identity is more than just a name – Verify, score, and complete consumer identities
Fuel marketing activation, AI and analytics with predictive consumer intelligence to target the right audience
Instantly add key behavioral, demographic, and lifestyle attributes to optimize marketing and analytics initiatives
Services
Verisk Marketing Solutions Announces the Launch of Innovative Real-Time Decisions Suite
Article
4 Strategic Changes Insurance Marketers Can Make to Stand Out
Article

Data Driven Organization

Verisk Marketing Solutions
Improve the reach, timing, relevance, and compliance of every consumer engagement
Identity resolution and consumer intelligence solutions deliver the foundational data layer for understanding the person behind every marketing interaction. Combining this with unique insights into in-market behaviors and the highest standards in the industry for data security and privacy, Verisk Marketing Solutions provides unique and differentiated value to CMOs, marketing teams and their partners.
Discover Verisk Marketing Solutions
Jornaya
Visibility across 55,000+ lead generation and comparison shopping sites in the U.S.
Infutor
Unmatched data and intelligence on 266 million U.S. individuals
Contact State
Partnered with the best and most trusted lead generators in Europe
Create exceptional customer experiences by future-proofing your marketing and removing the guesswork with Verisk Marketing Solutions.

results.title: Verisk Marketing Solutions Launches New Product Suite
results.content: Jersey City, N.J. and Philadelphia, March 14, 2023 - Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading global data analytics and technology provider, has launched a new product suite that helps marketers of considered purchases such as insurance make real-time decisions during inbound consumer interactions.
results.raw_content:
Join us in Salt Lake City, Utah from February 12–15, 2024.
Verisk Marketing Solutions Launches "Real-Time Decisions" Product Suite
Expanded Verisk data solutions power personalization and drive decisions, improving marketing ROI
Jersey City, N.J. and Philadelphia, March 14, 2023– Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading global data analytics and technology provider, has launched a new product suite that helps marketers of considered purchases such as insurance make real-time decisions during inbound consumer interactions.
The new “Real-Time Decisions” product suite from Verisk Marketing Solutions empowers marketers to make split-second choices about how best to engage with consumers, enabling improved customer experiences and higher conversion rates.
“Marketers and the analytics professionals supporting them need data available in real-time to inform instantaneous decisions that optimize consumer experiences," said Eli Schwarz, Chief Strategy Officer for Verisk Marketing Solutions. "Our Real-Time Decisions (RTD) suite of data solutions addresses that need through a single API call with immediate response times, enabling marketers in insurance and other considered purchases categories to improve the profitability of their inbound calls, leads, and website interactions.”
The Real-Time Decisions product line launches with five configurable features immediately available:
The launch of the Real-Time Decisions line follows a successful early adopter program.
“For the past six months, we’ve worked closely to gather feedback from strategic, trusted customers in insurance and other considered purchase verticals,” said John Park, senior product manager for Verisk’s Real-Time Decisions.  “Those customers have helped validate and prove out the core use cases for the solution that we believe will be most relevant to future customers across multiple industries.”
The most common use cases include:
The features delivered through Real-Time Decisions products are powered by the unique data asset ecosystem that Verisk Marketing Solutions has built through the acquisition and integration of Jornaya and Infutor. Jornaya’s proprietary network of over 55,000 comparison shopping sites combined with Infutor’s unique identity graph and people-based attributes enable Verisk Marketing Solutions to deliver the three key components of personalization – Who, What, and When – across all marketing channels. Bringing this information into a single source makes it easier than ever to manage consumer consent, mitigate compliance risk, and improve the efficacy and profitability of marketing efforts.
About Verisk Marketing SolutionsVerisk Marketing Solutions, a business unit of Verisk formed through the integration of Infutor and Jornaya, empowers marketers and platform partners to remove the guesswork around who, what, and when to reach out with personalized interactions aimed at engaging the right person, with the right message, at the right time. Verisk Marketing Solutions data integrates with marketers’ existing technology and evolves with consumers’ ever-changing behavior while maintaining the highest data security and privacy standards. To learn more about the consumer intelligence solutions available through Verisk Marketing Solutions, visit www.verisk.com.
###
Contact: Sarah Johndrowsjohndrow@bnoinc.com
